channel.description: Recent content in Sue Thompson on Music

item.title: Sue Thompson - Sad Movies
item.description:
Sad movies
always make me cry
He said
he had to work
So I went to
the show alone
They turned down
the lights
And turned
the projector on
And just as the news
of the world
Started to begin
I saw my darling
And my best friend
walking in
Though I was sitting
there they didn’t see
And so they sat right
down in front of me
And when he kissed
her lips
I almost died and
in the middle of
The color cartoon
I started to cry
Oh oh oh sad movies
always make me cry
Oh oh oh sad movies
always make me cry
So I got out and
slowly walked on home
And mama saw the tears
and said
What’s wrong
and so to keep from
Telling her a lie
I just said sad movies
Make me cry
oh oh oh sad movies
Always make me cry
oh oh oh sad movies
Always make me cry
woo- woo-
Sad movies
make me cry-
